      public <PayloadT extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> tell​(PayloadT messagePayload)
      Sends a message to this ReActor using system sync as source
      Parameters:
      messagePayload - payload
      Returns:
      A completable future that is going to be completed once the message has been delivered into the local driver bus, containing the outcome of the operation

    • aTell

      public <PayloadT extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> aTell​(PayloadT messagePayload)
      Sends a message to a this ReActor requiring an ack as a confirmation of the delivery into the target reactor's mailbox. The sender of the message is going to be the system sink
      Parameters:
      messagePayload - message payload
      Returns:
      A completable future that is going to be completed when an ack from the destination reactor system is received containing the outcome of the delivery of the message into the target actor mailbox

    • aTell

      public <PayloadT extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> aTell​(ReActorRef msgSender, PayloadT messagePayload)
      Sends a message to a this ReActor requiring an ack as a confirmation of the delivery into the target reactor's mailbox
      Parameters:
      msgSender - message source
      messagePayload - message payload
      Returns:
      A completable future that is going to be completed when an ack from the destination reactor system is received containing the outcome of the delivery of the message into the target actor mailbox

    • ask

      public <ReplyT extends java.io.Serializable,​ RequestT extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<ReplyT>> ask​(RequestT request, java.lang.Class<ReplyT> expectedReply, java.lang.String requestName)
      Send a message to this reactor and return its reply.
      Parameters:
      request - payload that is being sent to this reactor
      expectedReply - expected message type as reply to this request
      requestName - name of the request. It must be unique reactor name in the reactor system as long as this ask is alive
      Returns:
      A completable future that is going to be completed once an answer for the request has been received. On failure, the received Try will contain the cause of the failure, otherwise the requested answer

    • ask

      public <ReplyT extends java.io.Serializable,​ RequestT extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<ReplyT>> ask​(RequestT request, java.lang.Class<ReplyT> expectedReply, java.time.Duration expireTimeout, java.lang.String requestName)
      Send a message to this reactor and return its reply.
      Parameters:
      request - payload that is being sent to this reactor
      expectedReply - expected message type as reply to this request
      expireTimeout - mark this request as completed and failed after this timeout
      requestName - name of the request. It must be unique reactor name in the reactor system as long as this ask is alive
      Returns:
      A completable future that is going to be completed once an answer for the request has been received or the specified timeout is expired. On failure, the received Try will contain the cause of the failure, otherwise the requested answer
